description: Detects the execution of AdvancedRun utitlity Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious AdvancedRun Execution
query: (process.executable:*\\AdvancedRun.exe OR (process.command_line:*\ \/EXEFilename\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/Run*) OR (process.command_line:*\ \/WindowState\ 0* AND process.command_line:*\ \/RunAs\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/CommandLine\ *))
